q1.question: What is KI Konzept Builder?
q1.answer: KI Konzept Builder is an innovative platform that helps founders create professional business plans using artificial intelligence. Our platform offers structured templates, personalized consultation, and comprehensive support for all aspects of starting a business.

section1.title: ¬ß 1 Scope of Application
section1.content1: (1) These General Terms and Conditions (hereinafter "Terms") apply to all contracts concluded via the "AI Concept Builder" platform (hereinafter "Platform") between the operator Marcel G√§rtner (hereinafter "Provider") and users (hereinafter "Customer").
section1.content2: (2) The Terms apply exclusively. Deviating, conflicting or supplementary general terms and conditions of the Customer shall only become part of the contract if and to the extent that the Provider has expressly agreed to their validity.

section2.title: ¬ß 2 Subject of Contract
section2.content1: (1) The Provider offers the following services via the Platform:
section2.content2: (2) The exact service description results from the respective service description on the Platform.

generalInfo.title: General Information
generalInfo.content: The following information provides a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website. Personal data is any data with which you can be personally identified.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: Data processing is carried out by the website operator Marcel G√§rtner. You can find the contact details in the imprint of this website.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have the right at any time to receive information free of charge about the origin, recipient and purpose of your stored personal data.
